description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+24 vs AC; 2d8+8 damage.

At-Will

Standard

+23 vs ; 3d6+8 damage.. The dracolich makes a bite attack against each of two different targets.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Fear, Gaze, Psychic

Immediate Interrupt

Trigger: When an enemy attacks the dreambreath, recharge

The dreambreath dracolich fixes the target with its gaze; ranged 10; targets the triggering enemy; +24 vs Will; 2d6+6 psychic damage, and the target makes a melee or ranged basic attack (dragon's choice) as a free action against a randomly chosen adjacent ally.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Psychic, Sleep

Standard

Close blast 5

+24 vs Will; the target falls unconscious (save ends). Each Failed Saving Throw: The target takes 10 psychic damage and loses its lowest-level, unused encounter power until the end of the encounter.

Encounter ✦ Psychic, Sleep

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

The dreambreath dracolich's breath weapon recharges, and the dracolich uses it immediately.

Encounter ✦ Fear, Sleep

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +24 vs Will; the target is immobilized (save ends). First Failed Saving Throw: The target falls unconscious (save ends).

Recharge 4-6 ✦ Fear, Psychic

Standard

Close burst 5

+24 vs Will; 2d8+8 psychic damage, and the target is pushed 5 squares and is dazed (save ends).

At-Will

Move

The dreambreath dracolich moves up to its speed. It gains the insubstantial and phasing qualities during this move.
